# dictionaries/rougail/00-base.yml

```yaml
---
version: '1.1'
var:  # A suffix variable
  - val1
  - val2
dyn{{ identifier }}:
  description: A dynamic family
  dynamic:
    variable: _.var
  var:  # A dynamic variable
```

## A dynamic family

`basic`


This family builds families dynamically.

**Identifiers**: la valeur de la variable "rougail.var".
